titles.title: Relating to the discount factors applicable to medical malpractice companies under section 846 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/7/1993--Introduced. Allows medical malpractice insurance companies to elect to use the discount factors pursuant to the special rule for international and reinsurance lines of business until January 1, 1994.
